name: Maneuver Ability
description:
Maneuver Ability is a game about moving around enemies and making it to the down stairs (>)

You cannot directly damage enemies, but can bump into them to stun them for one turn and push them around and into things:

  • Pushing an enemy into an open square moves it backwards (non-floating enemies will die if pushed into a square containing magma)
  • Pushing an enemy into a wall deals one point of collision damage
  • Pushing an enemy into another creature forces them to attack it (triggering enemy infighting)

Currently there is no win condition, just see how far you can descend

Controls
  • Numpad / arrow keys / vi keys (hjklyubn) - movement and bumping enemies (8 direction)
  • . / 5 - wait a turn
  • x - examine enemies
  • p - expand message log
  • ? - show help menu
  • Esc - exit mode/menu or return to main menu
